mapper.select: select my.id, my.wwd_user_id, my.enjoyed_wwd_user_id, my.message, my.DATA_USER_ID, my.DATA_OFFICE_ID, my.DATA_TYPE, my.DATA_AREA_ID, my.DEL_FLAG, my.CREATE_AT, my.CREATE_BY, my.UPDATE_AT, my.UPDATE_BY from wwd_user_enjoy my JOIN wwd_user_enjoy it on it.enjoyed_wwd_user_id = my.wwd_user_id and my.enjoyed_wwd_user_id = it.wwd_user_id where my.del_flag = 'N' and it.del_flag = 'N' and my.wwd_user_id = #{wwdUserId}
